GetMemberRankList.Statement: SELECT w2_MemberRank.* FROM w2_MemberRank WHERE w2_MemberRank.valid_flg = 'ON' -- 有効 ORDER BY w2_MemberRank.member_rank_order

GetMemberRankDetail.Statement: SELECT w2_MemberRank.* FROM w2_MemberRank WHERE w2_MemberRank.member_rank_id = @member_rank_id AND w2_MemberRank.valid_flg = 'ON' -- 有効

GetDefaultMemberRank.Statement: SELECT w2_MemberRank.* FROM w2_MemberRank WHERE w2_MemberRank.default_member_rank_setting_flg = 'ON' -- デフォルトランク AND w2_MemberRank.valid_flg = 'ON' -- 有効
